td.content: s:pt complained of Heart. patient denied any fall or trauma. NKDA. patient is a 30 yr old f loan officer. she smokes one pack/day for 5 years she drinks alcohol heavily for the past 5 years o:Height 60 in, Weight 139 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 14 a:Embolic Stroke p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to cardiology.

s:female loan officer aged 30 Ys presents with progressive Heart for past 4 weeks. she is a heavy drinker she has been a chronic smoker for the last 4 years o:Height 60 in, Weight 138 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 14 a:Embolic Stroke p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered CT Head, ECG.

s:pt presents with Heart of 6 weeks duration. patient is a white female aged 30 years. she smokes one pack/day for 2 years she drinks at least 4 beers a day o:Height 61 in, Weight 141 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Embolic Stroke p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed ACTIVASE - 50 mg IV, and ordered MRI Brain.
